diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia Type 1 (MEN1), Hyperparathyroidism-Jaw Tumor Syndrome (HPT-JT), Familial Hypercalciuric Hypercalcemia
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The final diagnosis of FIHP was supported by a novel heterozygous germline mutation found in the MEN1 gene (IVS9/H110011G/H11022A) in affected family members, along with a lack of supportive findings for MEN1 or HPT-JT syndromes, such as normal prolactin and gastrin levels and negative imaging studies.
